projects.name: MickeyMailer
projects.description:
During my Studies taking a technical fourth year, we got assigned to solve problems that teachers themelves experienced in their day to day life 
. In our case an automatic reminder via mail at regular intervalls. It was an example of how consutling work was like where the teacher were treated as a client to add to realism.
